name: Mesmer Inference
title: Mesmer Inference
description: WIPP plugin to run inference using MESMER.
author: Vishakha Goyal (vishakha.goyal@nih.gov), Hamdah Shafqat Abbasi (hamdahshafqat.abbasi@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: tilesize
inputs.description: Tile size for images. Default is 256.

inputs.name: filePatternTest
inputs.description: Filename pattern to filter test data.

inputs.name: filePatternWholeCell
inputs.description: Filename pattern to filter nuclear data for whole cell segmentation.

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: Select which model to use. Default is mesmer.

ui.title: Test intensity images
ui.description: Input intesity image collection to be processed by this plugin.

ui.title: FilePattern Test
ui.description: Filename pattern to filter test data.

ui.title: FilePattern Whole Cell
ui.description: Filename pattern to filter nuclear data for whole cell segmentation.
